name: Five Nights at GD Twitter
description:
DISCLAIMER FOR ANDROID USERS: This game might not perform well on some older low-end Android devices.

A FNaF parody based around the GD Twitter community. Don't ask.

CONTROLS

A key - Close/open the left door
D key - Close/open the right door
S key - Toggle between the office and the cameras 

On mobile, you can also tap on the doors to close/open them.

Made in under 24 hours. All images, artwork and sounds used in this game belong to their respective owners.

This game is not affiliated with Geometry Dash, RobTop Games, and/or Five Nights at Freddy's. (duh)
